posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: hexo_github遇到的问题
posts.text: 取消不需要的侧边栏widgets（侧边栏挂件）这里其实很简简单，可能有些同学直接注释的时候发现在部署的时候可能会出错，其实是因为注释需要将开头的符号【 - 】 也一起注释掉 1234567891011121314151617$ # - #这个不注释的话可能会出现错误 # # Widget name # type: tagcloud # # Where should the widget be placed, left or right # position: left # - # # Widget name # type: archive # # Where should the widget be placed, left or right # position: left # - # # Widget name # type: tag # # Where should the widget be placed, left or right # position: left

posts.title: SMR
posts.text: smr随机读写能力差，不利于nas的长期读写 Recording MFG Series Capacity (TB) STD Model Sector Disk TB/Platter RPM SMR Seagate Archive 5 ST5000AS0011 512e 4 1.25 5980 SMR Seagate Archive 6 ST6000AS0002 512e 6 1.00 5980 SMR Seagate Archive 8 ST8000AS0002 512e 6 1.33 5980 SMR Seagate Exos 5E8 8 ST8000AS0003 512e 4 2.00 5980 SMR Seagate BarraCuda 2 ST2000DM005 512e 1 2.00 5400 SMR Seagate BarraCuda 2 ST2000DM008 512e 1 2.00 7200 SMR Seagate BarraCuda 3 ST3000DM007 512e 2 1.50 5400 SMR Seagate BarraCuda 4 ST4000DM004 512e 2 2.00 5400 SMR Seagate BarraCuda 6 ST6000DM003 512e 3 2.00 5400 SMR Seagate BarraCuda 8 ST8000DM004 512e 4 2.00 5400 SMR Seagate SkyHawk 3 ST3000VX009 512e 2 1.50 5900 SMR Seagate SkyHawk 6 ST6000VX001 512e 4 1.50 5900 表格参考链接：https://www.chiphell.com/thread-1676546-1-1.html

posts.title: 主板折腾
posts.text: 开机有时候开不起，老是随机跳电，一开始觉得是电源问题，然后朋友说是也可能主板，所以搞了个b85m gamer，发现并不是主板问题，还是老样子。 原来是b85-pro 大板 突然来了个小板子，换硬件是真的费劲 现在的b85 都是二手板了。买了二手版才发现水真深。 部分针歪的 板子整体歪的 挡板和主板对不齐 水洗板的隐患
